snippet.title: Surprise Launch! We Were Here Expeditions: The FriendShip out now on Steam, Epic, PlayStation & Xbox
snippet.description:
A bite-sized new We Were Here game is out now on Steam, PlayStation, Xbox and Epic Games!

Think you and your bestie can take on any challenge together? We’d like to see you try! To prove that your friendship can overcome anything, you will need to take on several puzzling challenges. 

The two of you are alone at sea when pursuing a distress call leads you to a deserted island, where you encounter a mysterious boat ride in an abandoned amusement park. This is a voyage you won’t forget, with puzzles that take two to solve. The state of your friendship will directly affect the state of your friend-ship! 

⚓ Board the FriendShip now ⚓ 
Steam: https://bit.ly/45CxTN9 
Epic Games: https://bit.ly/3Z5bDJ8 
PlayStation: https://bit.ly/3rcGSp8
Xbox: https://bit.ly/3Z9sWZO 

#WeWereHere #CoOp #Gaming 

Visit http://www.totalmayhemgames.com 
Looking for a co-op partner? Join the We Were Here discord channel! https://discord.gg/wewerehereseries 

Totally Awesome Merch available at: http://www.totalmayhemmerch.com 

We Were Here Socials: 
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/WeWereHereGame 
Reddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/WeWereHere 
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/WeWereHereGame 
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/TotalMayhemGames 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@totalmayhemgames
